greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k)=number of forests of labeled rooted trees of height at most 1, with n labels and k nodes, where any root may contain >= 1 labels, n >= 0, 0<=k<=n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..140, flattened
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[Binomial[n, k-t]*StirlingS2[n - (k-t), t]*t^(k-t), {t, 0, k}]; T[0, 0] = 1; T[_, 0] = 0;
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 11}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 31 2016, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 12 2008
